divs: Sighting DetailsAbove the star Marach. Glowing fireball the size of an aspirin at arms length. Glowed brightly then disappeared after moving south for 5 seconds.
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Hickory
There were no other sightings in Hickory on or around June 28th 2013
Summary: Hovered and slowly moved to the south. Then disappeared with no trace.
